A Day
Biking to Work

To celebrate National Bike to Work day I compiled some of the data of my daily commute.

Throughout college and most of my adult life I've been commuting by bike almost every day. Although sometimes it's not easy I'm very proud to have opportunity to pedal to work every day.

Distance

4.55

Minutes

20:17

Miles/Hour

13.42

Elevation/Ft

325
